title: queue time because of bug
body: I recent got a 20 min queue time because of the bug where people couldn't log in due to grey out sign in button i joined a game got an error and reloaded the client but found that i could not log back in can i get my queue removed or am i going to have to wait 20 mins because of something that i didn't do intentionally

replies.body: I do know that we had a strange login issue pertaining to that gray sign in button. We definitely want to help out where we can, but it'd be best to do so one on one. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into what happened and figure out how we can help there!

Same here!

ARRGG! This is very frustrating. I haven't even been able to get into Champ Select. Well, serverside I believe it's going into champ select but on my client it's just stuck on "Match Accepted". Then I get hit with the leaverbuster. Shake my disappointed head. Reminds of the dark ages of Riot history.
